#*: [[但]][[如果]][[你]][[使用]][[的]][[是]][[數碼相機]][[那]][[情況]][[就]][[不同]][[了]]，[[利用]][[強大]][[的]]PHOTOSHOP[[完全]][[可以]][[挽救]][[你]][[的]][[廢]][[片]]，[[甚至]][[乎]][[還]][[能]]'''化腐朽為神奇'''，[[將]][[一]][[張]][[平淡]][[的]][[照片]][[變成]][[一]][[張]][[看頭]][[十足]][[的]][[精品]][[之]][[作]][[呢]]！
#*:: ''But if you are using a digital camera, then the situation is different. Using powerful software such as PHOTOSHOP, you can utterly rescue a picture that you had deemed a lost cause. You can even '''make a silk purse out of a sow's ear''' by turning a dull photograph into a fine work of art.''
